title: Iced Pistachio and poppy seed strudel
ingredients: ['6 sheets of filo pastry', '200g unsalted butter / margarine', '100g soft brown sugar', '3 cooking apples – peeled and roughly chopped', '30g breadcrumbs', '150g chopped dates – fresh or dried', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', 'For the glaze', '150g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons chopped pistachio nuts', '3 tablespoons poppy seeds']
